name: McOsu
description: A free open-source circle-clicking rhythm game practice client for osu! beatmaps with Virtual Reality support. McOsu is developed separately from and has no direct affiliation with osu! or ppy Pty Ltd.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Not a Potato™ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: XAudio2 / DirectSound compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 or better (for VR) Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: XAudio2 / DirectSound compatible
